top_questions.text: What is the purpose of a table?​

Write down the output of the given program. (Show with dry run in table). [2] DECLARE SUB Show (XY$)​ CLS​ XY$ = "HTUOMENXSA"​ CALL Show(XY$)​ END SUB Show(XY$)​ A = 47​ FOR I = 1 TO 5​ N = A MOD 7​ PRINT MID$(XY$, N, 1)​ A = A - 1​ NEXT I​ END SUB
